CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 24, 1954, pg. 12 reads: "Easter Parade - The beautiful weather Sunday drew thousands of devout church-goers to their respective edifices to worship. And it also draw a glamorous parade of charming maids and matrons, bedecked in Easter finery.  Teenie Harris and Oceania Sockwell covered some fifteen churches to get the above photos...No. 9: Another group of Wesley Center AME Zion folks included Barbara Tyson, Alberta Thompson, and Vera Thompson."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Barbara Tyson, Alberta Thompson, and Vera Thompson (Matthews), standing in front of Wesley Center AME Zion Church for Easter Sunday, Centre Avenue
